name: Sinball
description:
Pinball from hell. A simple, but devilishly hard pinball-cross-platformer. Navigate to the end of each level to win.

This game was made for a final year project in Computing Science at Newcastle University.

It features an engine constructed from the ground-up, using middleware such as Box2D for physics, SFML for audio and an in-house graphics library for rendering.

The final game is data driven from level files, and an editor is available at:

https://joshhills.github.io/game-engine

Special thanks to Michael 'Mule' Mulay for his music.
